hero.title: We Create for You!
hero.subtitle: Your First Home
hero.description: Continuously and in line with Vision 2030, Establishment of Construction offers its products to its customers as a result of its continuous journey towards achieving excellence in the field of modern sustainable housing, fulfilling needs and contributing to achieving an integrated and sustainable life.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be pioneers in the real estate industry, providing innovative solutions that meet the needs of the local and international market and community

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Providing distinguished real estate projects that keep pace with the latest trends in the industry and achieving the highest levels of quality in implementation and management

goals.title: Our Goals
goals.description: Try to be the first choice in the real estate development industry in the Kingdom and abroad.

projects.sectionDescription: Our business strategy is based on innovation and adaptability. Starting from Riyadh, we strategically focus our efforts on a diverse portfolio of projects, including residential, commercial, hospitality, retail, tourist destinations, and public projects, reflecting the multi-faceted nature of our brand.

about.title: About Us
about.description: At Tasis Albina Real Estate Development Company, we strive to provide innovative real estate solutions that combine quality and transparency to meet our customers' needs. Our company was founded on solid values and extensive experience in real estate development, to be your ideal partner in achieving your residential and investment dreams.

home.title: Welcome to Our Website
home.description: Discover the best real estate services

services.freeServices: Free services provided for the first year

items.rental: Free electronic property rental service and connectivity
items.communication: Continuous communication between residents and project supervisor
items.maintenance: Regular maintenance of elevators, corridors, and lighting
items.water: Water bill payment and tank maintenance
items.staff: Regular payment of security guards and workers' salaries
items.electricity: Committed payment of electricity service bills

section1.title: About Us
section1.description: At Tasis Albina Real Estate Development Company, we strive to provide innovative real estate solutions that combine quality and transparency to meet our customers' needs. Our company was founded on solid values and extensive experience in real estate development, to be your ideal partner in achieving your residential and investment dreams.

section2.title: Our Vision
section2.description: We believe that real estate is not just buildings, but the foundation of a balanced and sustainable life. We work to deliver high-value projects with distinctive designs that meet our clients' aspirations.

section3.title: Our Mission
section3.description: To become the first name in the real estate market, relying on service excellence, design innovation, and full commitment to customer expectations.
